General.Name: Novartis India Limited
General.Description: Novartis India Limited operates as a healthcare company in India. It offers therapeutic products in the areas of bone and pain products under the Voveran brand; transplantation immunology products under the Simulect, Certican, Sandimmun, Neoral, and Myfortic brands; and neurosciences products under the Tegrital and Exelon brands. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India. Novartis India Limited is a subsidiary of Novartis AG.
General.Address: Inspire BKC, G Block, Mumbai, India, 400051

3.Name: Mr. N.  Kumar
